info.brief_description: Based on the classic Tom and Jerry Cartoon of the same name.
info.description:
Follow the cartoon, as Tom. You are in the care of a rather sadistic, little girl, who in this story, will be referred to as simply: "Mommy"

Based on your actions, you can follow the same course of events of the cartoon, or go a completely different route. Depending on your decisions, you may end up escaping from the clutches of the evil girl or, you might just make things even worse, for yourself.
